  • Method Details

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo​(Date date)
      Compares 2 dates to see if they are the same or not.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Date>
      Parameters:
      date - - the date that needs to be compared to
      Returns:
      0 if the dates are the same, 1 if date param is smaller, and -1 if date param is bigger

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Checks to ensure that the date in question is a valid day of the year between the years 1900 to present
      Returns:
      true if this is a real possible day and false otherwise
